data.fullContent: Livestock farmers use them to prevent cattle straying out of fields. Animals which can not usually be contained in fields ( hill sheep for example ) need a man and dog to look after them, which is an expense. Hedges were much more common before modern agriculture. Modern crop farming uses machines to gather the crop, and so hedges have all but disappeared in some areas.
data.answer: 饲养牲畜的农民用它们来防止牛离开田地。通常不能在野外饲养的动物(比如山羊)需要一个人和一条狗来照顾它们，这是一笔开销。在现代农业出现之前，树篱要常见得多。现代农作物种植使用机器采集作物，因此在一些地区，树篱几乎消失了。
